organic.title: CASA for Kids of Flathead County: Home
organic.snippet: CASA (Court Appointed Special Advocates) are volunteers, just like you, who stand up and speak out to help abused and neglected children in our community.

organic.title: What is CASA? : Who We Are - CASA for Kids of Flathead County
organic.snippet: Our mission is to recruit, train, and support volunteers to advocate for abused and neglected children in the community and in court.

organic.title: Board & Staff : Who We Are - CASA for Kids of Flathead County
organic.snippet: President: Marybeth Sampsel · Vice President: James Barnett · Treasurer: Julie Urban · Secretary: Sherry Mayo · Past President: Kim More.

organic.title: Overview : Volunteer : CASA for Kids of Flathead County
organic.snippet: Appointed by family court judges, CASA volunteers typically handle one case at a time until the child is placed in a safe, permanent home.

organic.title: CASA for Kids - Montana CASA GAL Association
organic.snippet: Find Your Local Program to Support or Become a Volunteer. Click on your county/area to find your CASA program. If you do not see a CASA in your area, ...
